message.body: Hey, Lindsey. Do you need the entire clip you gave me with the smoke at the end or can I just send you the segment with the smoke? How are you going to sync?
Just watched!!! They are GREAT. Give me a call when you have a chance'
Hey, Lindsey. I just sent you some vimeo links. 2 different versions of the closet and 1 version of the floor. I'm FTPing the .mov files now.
Cool. I think these clips are better, however, I'm starting to lose perspective. LOL
Thanks!! I'm on my way home now!
